title: From light to hydrogen: the complete life cycle of free charges in photocatalytic nanoparticles
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00190G, Paper
Jessica M. de la Perrelle, Rohan J. Hudson, Andrew Dolan, Sanjib Jana, Xun Pan, Mats R. Andersson, Howe-Siang Tan, Zuhur H. Alotaibi, Gunther G. Andersson, Trevor A. Smith, David M. Huang, Tak W. Kee
A complete picture of charge generation over 11 orders of magnitude in time in the high-performance PM6:Y6 organic-semiconductor blend from donor and acceptor excitation is obtained using ultrafast spectroscopy and kinetic modeling.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
